extra test failure is a known issue. So it is good.
I vote to merge this PR. JUnit should not be a must for this PR.  We need unit test cases for TrafCI, and we can create a new JIRA for that purpose. This PR is only to replace ANT with MAVEN. And allow some other important enhancement to trafCI can be made.

Thanks, @anoopsharma00, for fixing this. This regression failure is due to my change, https://github.com/apache/incubator-trafodion/pull/858, merged last Wednesday. I failed to run this particular suite and also failed to grep for this particular error message in the regression expected results. The script that I am writing for https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/TRAFODION-2380 will do the grep, so it should help make folks aware of what regression results need to be changed given an error message text change.

+1. Looks good to me now.
Hi @arvind-narain & @hegdean , do you have any further questions or comments?

close this PR for too many commit record, will open another PR soon.
Looks reasonable to me, removing some redundant variables. I understand changing the name throughout would be a very big change.

To run the script, cd $MY_SQROOT/sql/scripts, then do "python analyzeMessageGuide.py [--codeRefs]". If --codeRefs is present, option 2d above is executed; if it is absent, it is not. I ran this overnight last night with --codeRefs and it completed in three hours (not the six or seven feared).
jenkins, retest -- test automation was passing in SQ_HOME to installer, needs to by MY_SQROOT for this change and forward.

+1 
I agree that it would be a lot of work to change MY_SQROOT to TRAF_ROOT. But I think we should. Also I suggest maybe TRAF_HOME instead of TRAF_ROOT to be like other Hadoop projects (makes it easier for users). We could do it in stages. (So we would have MY_SQROOT and TRAF_HOME for a while). If you want to make a JIRA on this, you could assign to me, since there is no real rush.
@robertamarton, if you could review the security-related messages I'd really appreciate it. I wasn't completely sure of what to write for Recovery on some of them.
Thanks for all suggestions. I converted all MY_SQROOT to TRAF_HOME. let's see if it can pass  jenkins test.
jenkins, retest -- change to TRAF_HOME requires another set of changes in test automation
@anoopsharma00, could you take a look and make sure I got these right? Thanks.
@robertamarton, I've made updates based on your comments. Could you take another look? Thanks.

It is a very good change. I didn't review this change, but I think this change can be verified by testing only. So, can you please consider running the full-tests before merging this change in. Also you might need to fix any documents/knowledge base articles that refers to the old variables possibly as a different task from this.

You also need to give some heads up on how to migrate to this change on the existing work space when the  contributors pull in this change into their existing work space.

Also consider obtaining a fresh developer work space with these changes and test the normal contributor activity.

Trafodion SQL engine has the concept of Bulk Move of data enabled by default.  SQL detects if the bulk move can be enabled automatically and moves the data in bulk from CLI layer to its data flow processing queues. This would avoid reformatting the data or copy the data for every column from the CLI layer to the tuple structure that is used its data flow processing queues and thus improves the performance of data ingestion.

To keep this enabled the trusted client like ODBC driver/server needs to gather the descriptor information from SQL after the query is prepared and populate the buffer accordingly. The trusted client driver gets this from the server(mxosrvr) and populates the data according to the expected format to be passed through to the cli layer.

 This change seems to do it other way, deciding some portion of the descriptor information based on the data that is being passed in from the client. 

I am not sure if the code to get the descriptor information from long varchar columns is missing or the information obtained  from Trafodion engine for long varchar column  on the server side is not passed to the driver side correctly. If it is already done, can you please provide me some pointer how this information is handled in this code change
FYI: I just merged pull request 868, so the unit test is in the repository.
